mapper.update: update tb_jc_expert set popularity = #{pop} where id = #{uid}

select.if: SELECT e.id,e.nick_name nickName,v.lz_now lzNow,'1' pushed ,e.img,e.grade grade from tb_jc_victory v LEFT JOIN tb_jc_expert e on e.id=v.expert_id where v.lz_now>=4 and e.is_upshelf = '1'

SELECT e.id, e.nick_name nickName, v.lz_now lzNow, (SELECT count( * ) FROM tb_jc_plan p WHERE p.ascription_expert = e.id ) pushed, v.five_z fiveZ, v.six_z sixZ, v.seven_z sevenZ, v.eight_z eightZ, v.nine_z nineZ, v.ten_z tenZ , e.img, e.lable lable, e.grade grade from tb_jc_victory v LEFT JOIN tb_jc_expert e on e.id=v.expert_id where v.five_z=4 or v.six_z=5 or v.seven_z=6 or v.eight_z=7 or v.nine_z=8 or v.ten_z=9 and e.is_upshelf = '1'

SELECT e.id, e.nick_name nickName, return_seven_days returnSevenDays, (SELECT count( * ) FROM tb_jc_plan p WHERE p.ascription_expert = e.id ) pushed, e.img, e.lable lable, v.lz_now lzNow, e.grade grade from tb_jc_victory v LEFT JOIN tb_jc_expert e on e.id=v.expert_id where v.return_seven_days>100 and e.is_upshelf = '1'

SELECT e.id, e.nick_name nickName, (SELECT count( * ) FROM tb_jc_plan p WHERE p.ascription_expert = e.id ) pushed, e.img, v.lz_now lzNow, e.lable lable, v.lz_now lzNow, e.grade grade from tb_jc_victory v LEFT JOIN tb_jc_expert e on e.id=v.expert_id where v.seven_z=5 or v.eight_z=6 or v.nine_z=7 or v.ten_z=8 and e.is_upshelf = '1'

SELECT e.id, e.nick_name nickName, v.lz_now lzNow, e.lable lable, v.lz_now lzNow, (SELECT count( * ) FROM tb_jc_plan p WHERE p.ascription_expert = e.id ) pushed, e.grade grade, e.img from tb_jc_victory v LEFT JOIN tb_jc_expert e on e.id=v.expert_id where v.ten_z=7 or v.ten_z=6 or v.ten_z=5 and e.is_upshelf = '1'

SELECT e.id, e.nick_name nickName, v.lz_now lzNow, (SELECT count( * ) FROM tb_jc_plan p WHERE p.ascription_expert = e.id ) pushed, e.lable lable, e.grade grade, e.img from tb_jc_victory v LEFT JOIN tb_jc_expert e on e.id=v.expert_id where v.lz_now>=2 and e.is_upshelf = '1'

SELECT e.id, e.nick_name nickName, v.lz_now lzNow, (SELECT count( * ) FROM tb_jc_plan p WHERE p.ascription_expert = e.id ) pushed, v.three_z threeZ, v.four_z fourZ , e.lable lable, e.grade grade, e.img from tb_jc_victory v LEFT JOIN tb_jc_expert e on e.id=v.expert_id where v.three_z=2 or v.four_z=3 and e.is_upshelf = '1'

SELECT e.id, e.nick_name nickName, v.lz_now lzNow, (SELECT count( * ) FROM tb_jc_plan p WHERE p.ascription_expert = e.id ) pushed, v.lz_big lzBig , e.lable lable, e.grade grade, e.img from tb_jc_victory v LEFT JOIN tb_jc_expert e on e.id=v.expert_id where v.lz_big>=8 and e.is_upshelf = '1'

mapper.select: SELECT e.id,e.nick_name nickName,e.img,e.lable,e.introduction,(e.fans + e.start_fans) fans, v.trend,v.lz_now lzNow,z_seven_days zSevenDays,v.return_seven_days returnSevenDays,0 status,e.grade,e.popularity, v.ten_z tenZ, v.nine_z nineZ, v.eight_z eightZ, v.seven_z sevenZ, v.six_z sixZ, v.five_z fiveZ, v.four_z fourZ, v.three_z threeZ, v.lz_big lzBig from tb_jc_expert e LEFT JOIN tb_jc_victory v on e.id=v.expert_id LEFT JOIN tb_jc_record_focus f on e.id=f.expert_id where e.id=#{expertId} GROUP BY e.id

SELECT e.id, e.img, e.nick_name nickName, e.grade, e.lable, (e.fans + e.start_fans) fans, e.introduction, v.lz_now victory, v.z_Seven_Days zSevenDays, v.return_Seven_Days returnSevenDays, (SELECT count( * ) FROM tb_jc_plan p WHERE p.ascription_expert = e.id and p.status = '1') pushed, e.popularity popularity FROM tb_jc_expert e LEFT JOIN tb_jc_victory v ON e.id = v.expert_id where e.is_upshelf = '1'
ORDER BY victory desc
ORDER BY zSevenDays desc
ORDER BY returnSevenDays desc

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM( SELECT e.id,e.nick_name,e.lable,(e.fans + e.start_fans) fans,v.trend,e.img, (SELECT count(*) from tb_jc_plan where ascription_expert=f.expert_Id) pushed from tb_jc_record_focus f LEFT JOIN tb_jc_expert e on f.expert_Id=e.id LEFT JOIN tb_jc_victory v on f.expert_Id=v.expert_id where f.user_Id=#{userId} ) a
select * from tb_jc_expert e where e.id = #{id}

SELECT e.id, e.nick_name nickName, e.img, e.lable, e.introduction, (e.fans + e.start_fans) fans, v.trend, v.lz_now lzNow, z_seven_days zSevenDays, v.return_seven_days returnSevenDays, IFNULL(f.status,'0') status, e.grade, e.popularity, v.lz_big lzBig from tb_jc_expert e LEFT JOIN tb_jc_victory v on e.id=v.expert_id LEFT JOIN tb_jc_record_focus f on e.id=f.expert_id and f.user_id = #{userId} where e.id=#{expertId} GROUP BY e.id

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM( SELECT e.id expertId, e.nick_name expertName, e.lable expertType, (e.fans + e.start_fans) expertFans, e.img expertIcon, e.grade expertLevel, v.lz_now expertHitNum, (SELECT count(*) from tb_jc_plan where ascription_expert=f.expert_Id) expertReleaseCount from tb_jc_record_focus f LEFT JOIN tb_jc_expert e on f.expert_Id=e.id LEFT JOIN tb_jc_victory v on f.expert_Id=v.expert_id where f.user_Id=#{userId} and status = '1' ) a
